duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise a team responsible for Lease Administration for the real estate portfolio, including managing lease inventory and ensuring timely and accurate rent payments.
Review complicated lease agreements and legal documents escalated by the team, as well as account issues and disputes.
Drive the production of complex management reports and associated analysis, using business acumen and analytical ability to lead the team in identifying business drivers of results.
Train others on lease administration and financial systems, and manage key interfaces and interdependencies.
Initiate and/or lead increasingly complex department projects and continuous improvement activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Real Estate, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
